mapper.update:
update KQDS_CK_GOODS_IN
supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inhouse = #{inhouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
incode = #{incode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inremark = #{inremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zhaiyao = #{zhaiyao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_CK_GOODS_IN set supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inhouse = #{inhouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, incode = #{incode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inremark = #{inremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhaiyao = #{zhaiyao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditor = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shtime = #{shtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rkr = #{rkr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rktime = #{rktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instatus = #{instatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intype = #{intype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select gind.SEQ_ID, gind.goodsuuid,
convert(varchar,convert(decimal(18,3),gind.inprice)) as inprice,
gind.innum, gind.yxdate, gind.incode, gind.organization, gind.createuser, gind.createtime,
convert(varchar,convert(decimal(18,3),gind.rkmoney)) as rkmoney,
gin.supplier, gin.inhouse, gin.auditor, gin.shtime, gin.rkr, gin.stocktime from KQDS_CK_GOODS_IN_DETAIL gind LEFT JOIN KQDS_CK_GOODS_IN gin on gind.incode = gin.incode where gind.goodsuuid=#{goodsuuid} and gind.type = #{type} and gind.auditStatus=1 order by gind.createtime asc

select gind.SEQ_ID, gind.goodsuuid, convert(varchar,convert(decimal(18,3),gind.inprice)) as inprice, gind.innum, gind.phnum, gind.yxdate, gind.incode, gind.organization, gind.createuser, gind.createtime, convert(varchar,convert(decimal(18,3),gind.rkmoney)) as rkmoney, gin.supplier, gin.inhouse, gin.auditor, gin.shtime, gin.rkr, gin.stocktime from KQDS_CK_GOODS_IN_DETAIL gind LEFT JOIN KQDS_CK_GOODS_IN gin on gind.incode = gin.incode where gind.goodsuuid=#{goodsuuid} and gind.ph=#{ph} and gind.phnum > 0 and gind.auditStatus=1 order by gind.createtime asc
mapper.update: update KQDS_CK_GOODS_IN set check_status = 1 where SEQ_ID=#{goodsinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select inhouse from KQDS_CK_GOODS_IN where SEQ_ID = #{id}
mapper.update: update KQDS_CK_GOODS_IN set status = 1 where SEQ_ID=#{seq_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
